inputs.remark:
缺少 V4 follow up 数据。
V3 应补充：(1)患者带 FND 诊断返回听力诊所；(2)启动自我指导的听力保护减少计划和声音暴露增加计划；(3)停用 nortriptyline 和 betahistine。
当前仅记录癫痫频率变化，遗漏治疗干预启动信息。

logic_summary: Updated V3 collective_interpretation to explicitly include the return with FND diagnosis, the initiation of the self-directed management plan (hearing protection reduction, sound exposure increase), and the discontinuation of medications.
Added V4 follow-up visit to record the 6-month seizure-free outcome and the exceptional use of hearing protection.

patch_ops.value: Patient returned to the audiology clinic with an FND diagnosis. A self-directed program of gradual reduction of hearing protection and increased sound exposure was initiated. Nortriptyline and betahistine were discontinued. Follow-up showed a significant reduction in seizure frequency.

value.collective_interpretation: Subsequent review revealed the patient was seizure-free for the prior 6 months. Use of hearing protection was now exceptional rather than routine.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Patient was seizure-free for the prior 6 months; hearing protection use was exceptional.
